meanings.definition: In a very hot and dry manner
meanings.sent1: The desert sun beat down torridly on the travelers.

meanings.sent4: The heatwave torridly engulfed the entire town in its fiery grip.
meanings.sent5: The flames danced torridly in the scorching fire pit.
